Posts.Content: Jul 9, 2009 01:35AM ljb wrote: I haven't heard anything about a link between lantus and breast cancer.  Could you please tell me more as I also have been using lantus for about 4 years now.  I had an abnormal mammogram, also a mammotome, & was diagnosed early April with DCIS in right breast, had a partial mastectomy in May and met with the oncologist last Friday. I am doing the CT & simulation next week & rads to follow after that.  I am still trying to decide on tamoxephin or not?  Any thoughts?  It's an emotional, scary time with lots of waiting.  Linda
Posts.Title: please help sueps barbe1958
